General.Name: AiXin Life International Inc
General.Description: AiXin Life International, Inc., through its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells healthcare and nutritional products and wellness supplements in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through four segments: Advertising and Products, Pharmacies, Hotels, and Manufacture and Sale. It offers herbs, greens, and traditional Chinese remedies; and functional products, such as weight management products, probiotics, foods, and drinks. The company sells products through pharmacies, sales offices, exhibition events, conferences, and person-to-person marketing, as well as online. The company also provides products purchased from third parties, as well as advertising and marketing services. In addition, it operates AiXin Shangyan Hotel and retail pharmacies located in Chengdu City. The company is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: Hongxing Intl. Business Building 2, Chengdu, China
